snippet: The New York City jail system must be redesigned to serve the growing number of inmates with mental illnesses.
abstract: Editorial contends New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Joseph Ponte, new commissioner of city's Department of Corrections, need to remedy shameful problem of large percentage of inmates with mental illnesses; holds they must focus on improving mental health care behind bars and ensure that all mentally ill inmates are enrolled in Medicaid before their release; also supports new program that steers mentally ill people into mental health programs instead of jail.
lead_paragraph: The New York City jail system must be redesigned to serve the growing number of inmates with mental illnesses.
